name: sky
description: A simple Telegram userbot based on Telethon . Maintained by Sandeep

ايبي ايدي.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

ايبي هاش.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

كود تيرمكس.description: Get this value by running python3 telesetup.py locally or https://generatestringsession.sandeep1709.repl.run

معرف البوت.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the username of your bot

توكن البوت.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot.Worth it. Get it.

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: Set this one with only one the symbol to use it before your command to run like . , ' `

تركه فارغ.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

هيروكو اب كي.description: Required for updating the bot and other stuff get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: Use either goodcat or badcat .if you need custom deploy then type your git repo link
